reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith explains concepts clearly and is always willing to help students during office hours.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is amazing! Her classes are engaging, and she makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Green is very passionate about her subject and makes learning fun.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is an excellent teacher who really cares about his students' success.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson knows her material, but her lectures are monotonous and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is a great lecturer, and he provides real-world examples that make the material relevant.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is incredibly insightful and creates a supportive learning environment.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson is okay, but his exams are tough and not always reflective of the lectures.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very knowledgeable and approachable. Her classes are well-organized.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is a fantastic teacher with a deep love for literature. His classes are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas is knowledgeable, but sometimes the material can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Clark encourages critical thinking and great class discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is incredibly passionate about the environment and inspires her students to make a difference.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Kingâ€™s lectures are not very engaging, and the assignments are unclear.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. White explains statistical concepts clearly and provides good practice problems.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is engaging and brings real-world experience into the classroom.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is knowledgeable, but sometimes her lectures lack structure.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Prof. Young is an excellent teacher who makes complex linguistic theories understandable.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is incredibly enthusiastic and makes learning physics enjoyable.
